name: Z-Life is a Gamble
effect: Ranged. High Critical. Inflict Flinched. Grants 10 Ã— Rank :pokecoin: to all Partymembers. This effect can only be triggered when the user is under stress. Multiply the amount of money gained by a random number from 0.5 to 3 - Roll one die and half the result to determine the multiplier.
description: Haru taps into the realms of probability to create a barrage of coins and throw them at the foe's head, before, by pure chance, all of them bounce right back to his party's hands/paws. This will leave the foe a bit dizzy.
